name: Nana's Pettin' Emporium
description:
Welcome to Nana's Pettin' Emporium! It's the fuzziest place on Earth where a cold nose can warm the stoniest of hearts!

At the moment, Nana is in a bit of a conundrum; she adopted so many puppies and they all want her love, but she only has two hands! Help sweet, little old Nana pet her puppies so they will be full of love and ready for loving families to adopt!

How many puppies can you love in a minute?


Features:

  • Fun for all ages!
  • Simplistic controls!
  • Fountains of flying puppies!
  • Music by @JDWasabi, composer of Dragon Fin Soup!
  • Many thanks to @jilbert for making patterns for Nana's awesome dress!

How To Play:

  • Use LEFT & RIGHT ARROW KEYS to move Nana!
  • Use SPACEBAR to pet ALL the Puppies!
  • Repeat!
